ui.gui_select_news: Please select a news item from the list, sir.
ui.gui_refresh_done: Refresh complete. Everything is up to date, sir.
ui.gui_startup_msg: [*] Jeeves: Starting the initial routines, sir...
ui.added_news: New news added to the archive.
ui.analysis_intro: Here is a summary of the news, sir:
ui.archive_error: There were delays in archiving, sir: {}
ui.processing: Analyzing news, please wait a moment, sir...
ui.pending_count_msg: news items are awaiting analysis, sir.
ui.quota_error: Apologies sir, the AI usage quota has been reached for now.

ui.report_ready: The report is ready for review, sir.
ui.error_occurred: Apologies, sir, an unexpected error occurred.
ui.no_priority_news: No urgent news at the moment, sir.

archive.synced: [*] Jeeves: Sir, synchronized {} new items to the archive.

en.ai_instruction: Analyze the following news. Write a concise, factual, and clear summary in Finnish. DO NOT include greetings, your name, or closing remarks. Only write the technical content of the news. ADD at the end a short 'Source Evaluation', stating the certainty of the news (e.g., official statement, stable announcement, unconfirmed rumor, or benchmark leak) and an assessment of its criticality.

greetings.morning: Good morning, sir. Here is the latest situational report.
greetings.day: Good day, sir. Here is the situation report for the day.
greetings.afternoon: Good afternoon, sir. Here is the latest situational report.
greetings.evening: Good evening, sir. Here is the latest situational report for the evening.
greetings.night: Good night, sir. Here is the nightly situational report.

category_comments.Security: I unfortunately have some somewhat concerning news about security, sir.
category_comments.Critical: This seems extremely critical, sir. I recommend immediate attention.
category_comments.Steam: A brief moment for some entertainment, sir? Steam news, here you go.
category_comments.Linux: There's movement on the kernel front again, as we might have expected, sir.
category_comments.Ubuntu: Updates have occurred in the Ubuntu community, sir.
category_comments.Gaming: News related to gaming, here you go.
category_comments.Hardware: Hardware news and benchmark results, sir.
category_comments.Default: Here is the news you requested, sir.

personality.analysis_intro: I am Jeeves, your butler, and I am pleased to summarize this news for you.
personality.analysis_outro: I hope this summary has been useful to you, sir. Can I assist you with anything else?
idle_comments: I am here to serve you, sir.
Do you have any other requests I could fulfill?
